page.title: 17A TEACHER
page.content: "Pupils used to respect their teachers because of that label,but now teachers are judged by their own personalities or ability to teach." Education cuts are affecting the school-classes are a lot larger eg:-35 pupils per class and there is a lack of books.Teachers are rather demoralised.The pay for teaching is between Â£100 and Â£200 and some teachers at the bottom of the scale claim supplimentary benefit.It seems that larger classes in secondary schools are occuring at the same time as primary schools are closing,due to a fall in total pupil numbers."Teachers do not understand how this has been allowed to happen."
